text: The 2006-07 season was Burnley's 7th season in the second tier of English football. They were managed by Steve Cotterill in his third full season since he replaced Stan Ternent at the beginning of the 2004-05 season. ==Appearances and goals== :Source: :Numbers in parentheses denote
